data.title: About: Ennominae
data.meta_description: Ennominae is the largest subfamily of the geometer moth family (Geometridae) with some 9,700 described species in 1,100 genera. They are usually a fairly small moths, though some (such as the peppered moth) grow to be considerably large. This subfamily has a global distribution. It includes some species that are notorious defoliating pests. The subfamily was first described by Philogène Auguste Joseph Duponchel in 1845.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Ennominae és la més gran de les subfamílies dels lepidòpters geomètrids, família (Geometridae), amb unes 9.700 espècies descrites distribuïdes en 1.100 gèneres. Normalment són papallones bastant petites però hi ha excepcions. Aquesta subfamília té una distribució cosmopolita. Inclou algunes erugues defoliants dels conreus. L'estatus d'algunes tribus és discutit. (ca)

Ennominae is the largest subfamily of the geometer moth family (Geometridae) with some 9,700 described species in 1,100 genera. They are usually a fairly small moths, though some (such as the peppered moth) grow to be considerably large. This subfamily has a global distribution. It includes some species that are notorious defoliating pests. The subfamily was first described by Philogène Auguste Joseph Duponchel in 1845. The status of several tribes is debated.For example, the Boarmiini are sometimes massively expanded to include the Bistonini, , , Gnophini, , and . The Nacophorini and perhaps the might need to be merged with the , and all three might warrant merging into the Ennomini.The group sometimes separated as Cassymini is tentatively included in the Abraxini here. The Alsophilinae, usually treated as a small subfamily in their own right, might simply be a specialized lineage of Boarmiini. (en)

Die Ennominae sind eine große Unterfamilie der Spanner (Geometridae), innerhalb der Schmetterlinge (Lepidoptera). (de)

Ennominae es la subfamilia más numerosa de lepidópteros ditrisios de la familia Geometridae, con más de la mitad de las especies de esta familia. Son usualmente pequeñas polillas, aunque algunas (como Biston betularia) adquieren gran tamaño. Son de distribución mundial. Algunas especies son defoliadoras y son serias plagas. La mayoría son grises.​ (es)

Les Ennominae sont une sous-famille de lépidoptères (papillons) de la famille des Geometridae. (fr)

De Ennominae zijn de grootste onderfamilie van vlinders uit de familie van de spanners, met zo'n 9.700 benoemde soorten in 1.100 geslachten. Het zijn meestal vrij kleine vlinders, hoewel sommige (zoals de peper-en-zoutvlinders) aanzienlijk groter worden. Deze onderfamilie heeft een wereldwijde verspreiding. (nl)

Пяденицы пёстрые (лат. Ennominae) — крупнейшее подсемейство бабочек из семейства пядениц (Geometridae). 9700 видов и 1100 родов. Древнейшие представители подсемейства обнаружены в балтийском янтаре. (ru)

灰尺蛾亞科（學名：Ennominae），又名枝尺蛾亚科，是鱗翅目尺蛾科之下六個亞科當中成員最多的一個亞科，計有約1,100個屬，合共約9,700個物種。本亞科物種一般比較小，儘管成員中有特殊例子（如：樺尺蠖）的體形頗大。本亞科的物種遍布全球，部份物種更被視為害蟲。 由於本亞科物種繁多，一般為先歸類為約30個族。不過，這30個族的分類有相當數量仍然有爭議。即使是物種的屬，在近十年間的變動亦不少。 (zh)

Ennominae — підродина метеликів родини П'ядуни (Geometridae). (uk)
